sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect, useContext } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { LanguageContext } from '../components/Navbar'; import { servicesData } from '../data/servicesData'; import '../styles/Services.css'; const Services = () => { const [services, setServices] = useState([]); const { language, translations: t } = useContext(LanguageContext); useEffect(() => { // Load services from localStorage if they exist const savedServices = localStorage.getItem('services'); if (savedServices) { setServices(JSON.parse(savedServices)); } else { setServices([...servicesData]); } }, []); return (

{t[language].ourServices}

{t[language].serviceDescription}

{t[language].service1Title}

{t[language].service1Desc}

{t[language].service2Desc}

{t[language].ourServices}

{t[language].serviceDescription}

{services.map((service, index) => (

{language === 'ar' ? t[language][`service${index + 1}Title`] || service.title : service.title }

{language === 'ar' ? t[language][`service${index + 1}Desc`] || service.description : service.description }

    {service.features.map((feature, idx) => (
  • {feature}
    • ))}
))}

{t[language].ourProcess}

{t[language].processSubheader}

1

{t[language].step1Title}

{t[language].step1Desc}

2

{t[language].step2Title}

{t[language].step2Desc}

3

{t[language].step3Title}

{t[language].step3Desc}

4

{t[language].step4Title}

{t[language].step4Desc}

{t[language].getInTouch}

{t[language].contactUs}

{t[language].contactNow}
); }; export default Services;
